newsitem.title: USA: Fed seen adding reserves via three-day system RP.
newsitem.headline: Fed seen adding reserves via three-day system RP.

text.p: The Federal Reserve is expected to add reserves to the banking system on Monday via three-day system repurchase agreements, analysts said.
"We're looking for three-day system RP's," said an analyst at Stone and McCarthy Research Associates Inc.
Analysts at consulting firm MMS International Inc. also predicted the Fed will add reserves via three-day system RP's.
At 1100 EDT/1500 GMT, the federal funds rate stood at 5-3/16 percent, below the Fed's 5-1/4 percent target.
